skills.skill: Customization in SAP ECC FI&CO modules

duties_responsibilities.duty: Implementation and support of SAP Finance and Controlling processes
Analyzing requirements and designing solutions using SAP best practices
Configuring Finance and Controlling modules and associated master data
Performing integration and system testing to ensure proper functioning of the solutions with the other modules
Coordinating with the users to test the solutions
Developing business process documentation and user training manuals
Implementing cross functional solutions by working with cross functional implementation team
Planning and coordinating cut-over activities for smooth transition
Preparing necessary documentation such as configuration, gap fit analysis, decisions taken
Developing functional specifications for development objects and working with the development team to deploy completed solutions

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree (BA/BS) from four-year college or University in Accounting, Business administration, Management Information Systems or equivalent
